last_episode_to_air.name: Part 4: Gender
last_episode_to_air.overview: Larry examines the way comedians in Saudi Arabia and media stars in Nigeria struggle against or reinforce misogynistic and homophobic attitudes.

name: Larry Charles' Dangerous World of Comedy
original_name: Larry Charles' Dangerous World of Comedy
overview: Legendary comedy writer and director Larry Charles travels the world in search of humor in the most unusual, unexpected and dangerous places.

episodes.name: Part 1: War - The Survivors
episodes.overview: Larry visits war victims in Iraq, where topical satire thrives but stand-up struggles, and Liberia, where comedy was revived by the Ebola crisis.

episodes.name: Part 2: War - The Soldiers
episodes.overview: Larry interviews soldiers who have turned their painful combat experiences into comedy, including a veteran whose injuries fuel his stand-up routine.

episodes.name: Part 3: Race
episodes.overview: In the U.S., Larry explores how racial division becomes comic fodder for minorities and immigrants -- as well as underground alt-right humorists.

episodes.name: Part 4: Gender
episodes.overview: Larry examines the way comedians in Saudi Arabia and media stars in Nigeria struggle against or reinforce misogynistic and homophobic attitudes.
